description: Insulation gets some stylish inspiration with the Tri Thermal Threads 1/4 Zip for men—here to elevate your cold-weather wardrobe in a big way. Start with Polartec® Thermal Pro® fabric, an advanced fleece technology that delivers a hefty dose of warmth, without the weight. Out the outer shell, a densely knitted yarn creates a classic vibe. While inside, soft lining adds an extra layer of coziness. But of course, we couldn’t have all these next-level warmth without the design details to back it up. That’s why you’ll find a classic sweater knit front and velour fleece back, a secure zip chest pocket, and of course, the sporty style of a metallic quarter-length zipper.
name: Prana Tri Thermal Threads 1/4 Zip - Mens
